Package Contents¶

EagerBoundsSearch

Optimize estimator parameters within an interval

class pangeo_fish.hmm.optimize.EagerBoundsSearch(estimator, param_bounds, *, optimizer_kwargs={})¶

Optimize estimator parameters within an interval

Parameters¶

estimatorEstimator

The estimator object. Has to have the set_params(**params) -> Estimator and score(data) -> float methods. Only a single parameter is supported at the moment.

param_boundssequence of float

A sequence containing lower and upper bounds for the parameter.

optimizer_kwargsmapping, optional

Additional parameters for the optimizer

fit(X)¶

optimize the score of the estimator

Parameters¶
XDataset

The input data.

Returns¶
estimator

The estimator with optimized parameters.

class pangeo_fish.hmm.optimize.GridSearch(estimator, search_grid)¶

Optimize estimator parameters using a search grid

Parameters¶

estimatorEstimator

The estimator object. Has to have the set_params(**params) -> Estimator and score(data) -> float methods. Only a single parameter is supported at the moment.

search_gridmapping of str to sequence

The search grid.

fit(X)¶

search for optimal parameters

Parameters¶
XDataset

The input data.

Returns¶
optimizedEstimator

The estimator with optimized parameters.

class pangeo_fish.hmm.optimize.TargetBoundsSearch(estimator, x0, param_bounds, *, optimizer_kwargs={})¶

Parameters¶

The estimator object. Has to have the set_params(**params) -> Estimator and score(data) -> float methods. Only a single parameter is supported at the moment.
